DOC.brief_summary: The study examine possible effect community campaign decrease duration untreated psychosis person first episode psychotic disorder .
DOC.detailed_description: The study examine whether community campaign reduce time duration untreated psychosis ( DUP ) among person first episode psychosis ( FEP ) . The DUP mental health patient FEP seek service public outpatient inpatient facility assess 15 month period prior campaign launch . This serve baseline historical control . The DUP continue assess another 3 year . The hypothesis test significant decrease DUP baseline , one-year , two-year three-year follow-up . This study carry Latinos Los Angeles County group , particularly among Spanish-speaking immigrant , Latinos high risk prolong DUP .
DOC.criteria: Meet Diagnostic Statistical Manual4 criterion psychotic disorder Latino origin neurological disorder suffers brain trauma
